content: as every year i start with a free square this time it is lucy a 10-inch square made with stylecraft special double knit and a 4mm hook approx 124 meters/135 2 yards of yarn needed 42 grams if you use aran/worsted weight yarn it will give you a 12 inch square you can follow a 2 3 5 or 7 colour scheme which are listed in the separate pdf as well as the yarn amounts used per round for if you want to use your stash the pattern is available in us and uk terms as photo tutorial step by step photo s at every round or as written only with just 1 photo the colours used for the photo tutorial are white and pistachio i hope you all will enjoy making lucy l♥ve ineke
